snippet.title: Happy Game - Launch Trailer (Oct 28)
snippet.description:
Happy Game is launching on Windows, Mac and Nintendo Switch this October 28!

Wishlist:
Steam https://bit.ly/HappyGameSteam
GOG https://bit.ly/HappyGameGOG
Nintendo https://bit.ly/HappyGameSwitch

Happy Game is a new psychedelic horror adventure from the creators of Botanicula and CHUCHEL. With its many smiley faces, inexplicable abominations and unsettling audio by the Czech freak-folk duo DVA, Happy Game is sure to make its players very happy. Or maybe not.

A little boy falls asleep to a horrible nightmare. Can you make him happy again?

- Brand new psychedelic horror adventure from the creators of Botanicula and CHUCHEL
- Endure and escape three unforgettable nightmares
- Solve deeply disturbing puzzles in (not so) charming environments
- Deal with suspicious smiley faces and pink bunnies
- Creepy songs and screeches from the Czech freak-folk band DVA

Credits:
iStock.com/Hispanolistic
iStock.com/shironosov
iStock.com/fizkes
iStock.com/Bavorndej
iStock.com/TODCHAMP
iStock.com/simonkr
